mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORPL_INPUT ( ORPLIN_NUM, ORPLIN_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ORPLIN_NUM),0)+1 FROM ORPL_INPUT), SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO ORDER_PLAN ( ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM, ORDPL_ONUM, ORDPL_PRODUCT_CODE, ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME, ORDPL_PRODUCT_STNDR, ORDPL_QT, ORDPL_PR_EA, ORDPL_WR ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(ORPLIN_NUM) FROM ORPL_INPUT), #{ORDPL_ONUM}, #{ORDPL_PRODUCT_CODE}, #{ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME}, #{ORDPL_PRODUCT_STNDR}, #{ORDPL_QT}, #{ORDPL_PR_EA}, #{ORDPL_WR} )
INSERT INTO ORDER_INPUT ( ORDIN_NUM, ORDIN_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ORDIN_NUM),0)+1 FROM ORDER_INPUT), SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO ORDERLIST ( ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, ORDER_NUM, ORDER_PRODUCT_CODE, ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_PRODUCT_STNDR, ORDER_QT, ORDER_PR_EA, ORDER_WR ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(ORDIN_NUM) FROM ORDER_INPUT), #{ORDER_NUM}, #{ORDER_PRODUCT_CODE}, #{ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME}, #{ORDER_PRODUCT_STNDR}, #{ORDER_QT}, #{ORDER_PR_EA}, #{ORDER_WR} )
INSERT INTO BOOKMARK ( BK_CODE, BK_NAME, BK_STNDR, BK_PR_EA, BK_QT, BK_WR ) VALUES ( #{BK_CODE}, #{BK_NAME}, #{BK_STNDR}, #{BK_PR_EA}, #{BK_QT}, #{BK_WR} )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_STNDR, PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT
SELECT ITEM_NO as ITEM_INDEX, ITEM_PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_STNDR, ITEM_QTY, PRODUCT_SAFE, PRODUCT_PRICE FROM ITEM INNER JOIN PRODUCT ON ITEM.ITEM_PRODUCT_CODE = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE
SELECT ROWNUM, BK_CODE AS ORDER_PRODUCT_CODE, BK_NAME AS ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, BK_STNDR AS ORDER_PRODUCT_STNDR, BK_PR_EA AS ORDER_PR_EA, BK_QT AS ORDER_QT, BK_WR AS ORDER_WR FROM BOOKMARK

SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDIN_DATE, ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, ORDER_WR, NVL(ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME,'합계') AS ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, SUM(ORDER_QT) AS ORDER_QT, ORDER_PR_EA, SUM(ORDER_QT*ORDER_PR_EA) AS ORDER_PR_TOT FROM ORDER_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDERLIST ON ORDER_INPUT.ORDIN_NUM = ORDERLIST.ORDER_ORDIN_NUM GROUP BY ROLLUP((ORDIN_DATE, ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_WR,ORDER_PR_EA))

SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDIN_DATE, ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, ORDER_WR, NVL(ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME,'합계') AS ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, SUM(ORDER_QT) AS ORDER_QT, ORDER_PR_EA, SUM(ORDER_QT*ORDER_PR_EA) AS ORDER_PR_TOT FROM ORDER_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDERLIST ON ORDER_INPUT.ORDIN_NUM = ORDERLIST.ORDER_ORDIN_NUM WHERE ORDIN_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{DATESTART}, 'YY-MM-DD') and ORDIN_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{DATEEND},'YY-MM-DD')+1 GROUP BY ROLLUP((ORDIN_DATE, ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_WR,ORDER_PR_EA))

SELECT ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM, ORDPL_ONUM, TO_CHAR(ORPLIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), ORDPL_PRODUCT_CODE, ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME, ORDPL_PRODUCT_STNDR, ORDPL_QT, ORDPL_PR_EA, ORDPL_WR FROM ORPL_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDER_PLAN ON ORPL_INPUT.ORPLIN_NUM = ORDER_PLAN.ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM ORDER BY ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM, ORDPL_ONUM

SELECT MAX(ORDER_ORDIN_NUM) AS ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, MAX(TO_CHAR(ORDIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS ORPLIN_DATE, MAX(ORDER_WR) AS ORDER_WR, MAX(ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME) AS ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, COUNT(ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME)-1 AS ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT, SUM(ORDER_QT*ORDER_PR_EA) AS TOTAL_PR, MAX(ORDIN_END) AS ORDER_END FROM ORDER_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDERLIST ON ORDER_INPUT.ORDIN_NUM = ORDERLIST.ORDER_ORDIN_NUM GROUP BY ORDER_ORDIN_NUM ORDER BY ORDER_ORDIN_NUM DESC

SELECT MAX(ORDER_ORDIN_NUM) AS ORDER_ORDIN_NUM, MAX(TO_CHAR(ORDIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS ORPLIN_DATE, MAX(ORDER_WR) AS ORDER_WR, MAX(ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME) AS ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, COUNT(ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME)-1 AS ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT, SUM(ORDER_QT*ORDER_PR_EA) AS TOTAL_PR, MAX(ORDIN_END) AS ORDER_END FROM ORDER_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDERLIST ON ORDER_INPUT.ORDIN_NUM = ORDERLIST.ORDER_ORDIN_NUM WHERE ORDIN_END = #{ORDIN_END} GROUP BY ORDER_ORDIN_NUM ORDER BY ORDER_ORDIN_NUM

SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(ORPLIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS ORPLIN_DATE, MAX(ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM) AS ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM, MAX(ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME) AS ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME, COUNT(ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME)-1 AS ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME_COUNT FROM ORPL_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDER_PLAN ON ORPL_INPUT.ORPLIN_NUM = ORDER_PLAN.ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM GROUP BY ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM

SELECT ORDPL_PRODUCT_CODE AS ORDER_PRODUCT_CODE, ORDPL_PRODUCT_NAME AS ORDER_PRODUCT_NAME, ORDPL_PRODUCT_STNDR AS ORDER_PRODUCT_STNDR, ORDPL_QT AS ORDER_QT, ORDPL_PR_EA AS ORDER_PR_EA, ORDPL_WR AS ORDER_WR FROM ORPL_INPUT INNER JOIN ORDER_PLAN ON ORPL_INPUT.ORPLIN_NUM = ORDER_PLAN.ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM WHERE ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM = #{ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM} ORDER BY ORDPL_PRODUCT_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERLIST SET ORDER_ORDIN_NUM = #{ORDER_ORDIN_NUM}, ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}, ORDER_PRODUCT_CODE = #{ORDER_PRODUCT_CODE}, ORDER_QT = #{ORDER_QT}, ORDER_PR_EA = #{ORDER_PR_EA}, ORDER_WR = #{ORDER_WR}, ORDER_SUMMA = #{ORDER_SUMMA}, ORDER_STAT = #{ORDER_STAT}, ORDER_END = #{ORDER_END} WHERE ORDER_ORDIN_NUM = #{ORDER_ORDIN_NUM}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ORPL_INPUT WHERE ORPLIN_NUM IN ( SELECT ORPL_INPUT.ORPLIN_NUM FROM ORPL_INPUT LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_PLAN ON ORPL_INPUT.ORPLIN_NUM = ORDER_PLAN.ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM WHERE ORDER_PLAN.ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM IS NULL )
DELETE FROM ORDER_PLAN WHERE ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM = #{ORDPL_ORDLIN_NUM} AND ORDPL_ONUM = #{ORDPL_ONUM}
